Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

package it.polimi.ingsw.controller
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.client

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClientHandler
    ClientHandler's class handles the communication between a single client and the server by making use of sockets.
    GameController
    Class GameController receives parameters relative to game moves from GameHandler and communicates with model's Game class in order to apply those moves.
    GameHandler
    GameHandler's class receives messages from clients through ClientHandler class and propagates them to GameController, in order to change the model's state.
    Lobby
    This class manages the phase between the connection of a client and the beginning of a new game.
    Server
    Server class is the main class on the server side: it manages the connection's setup phase up to the game's start; it also handles the registration of clients.
    ServerSocketConnection
     
    UpdateMessageBuilder
    Class UpdateMessageBuilder is responsible for the assembly of an UpdateMessage carrying the information about changes in the model state.
